setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Power-up Default Value for COSC bits

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears on RA6
option.name: ON

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; I/O function on RA6
option.name: OFF

setting.name: VDDAR
setting.description: VDD Range Analog Calibration Selection bit

option.description: Internal analog systems are calibrated for operation between VDD = 2.3V - 5.5V
option.name: HI

option.description: Internal analog systems are calibrated for operation between VDD = 1.8V - 3.6V
option.name: LO

option.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is MCLR; If LVP = 1, RE3 pin function is MCLR
option.name: EXTMCLR

option.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is port defined function; If LVP = 1, RE3 pin function is MCLR
option.name: INTMCLR

option.description: WDT enabled regardless of Sleep; SEN bit is ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT enabled while Sleep = 0, suspended when Sleep = 1; SEN is ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset Enabled, SBOREN bit is ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN bit
option.name: SBOREN

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (VBOR) is set to 2.85V
option.name: HI

option.description: The PPSLOCKED bit can be set once after an unlocking sequence is executed; once PPSLOCKED is set, all future changes to PPS registers are prevented
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCKED bit can be set and cleared as needed (unlocking sequence is required)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a reset
option.name: OFF

setting.name: WRTSAF
setting.description: Storage Area Flash (SAF) Write Protection bit

option.description: Low Voltage programming enabled. MCLR/Vpp pin function is MCLR. MCLRE Configuration bit is ignored.
option.name: ON

option.description: High Voltage on MCLR/Vpp must be used for programming
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CP
setting.description: User Program Flash Memory Code Protection bit

option.description: User Program Flash Memory code protection is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: User Program Flash Memory code protection is enabled
option.name: ON

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)

option.name: Starts at rising edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts at rising edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts at falling edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts at falling edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts at rising edge and resets on TMR2_ers=0
option.alias: Starts at rising edge and resets on TMR2_ers=0

option.name: Starts at falling edge and resets on TMR2_ers=1
option.alias: Starts at falling edge and resets on TMR2_ers=1

option.name: Starts on rising edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts on rising edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts on falling edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts on falling edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts on rising/falling edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts on rising/falling edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts at TMR2_ers=1 and resets on TMR2_ers=0
option.alias: Starts at TMR2_ers=1 and resets on TMR2_ers=0

option.name: Starts at TMR2_ers=0 and resets on TMR2_ers=1
option.alias: Starts at TMR2_ers=0 and resets on TMR2_ers=1
